item.title: Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing
item.description:
Intention: Explore the possibilities of implementing a Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing system via the Chord algorithm.
Authored by: G. Emanuel, T. Fraser, E. Kemp and F. Todoric
Read the paper here.

item.title: Magic Realm
item.description: The goal: Create a networked, multiplayer version of the classic board game Magic Realm. Allow users to travel across the board, find gold, engage in combat and fight ghosts. The technology: Both the client and the server are built using Java and the socket API. Handler threads handle the networking...

item.title: gradecalc.co
item.description: The goal: Create a simple application to let students and instructors calculate their grades. I want users to be able to create profiles where their grades are saved for each of their classes. Each time the user visits the site they simply input whatever new grade they received and their...

item.title: filiptodoric.com
item.description:
The goal: Make a simple website to where people can get to know me, and learn about my ongoing projects.
The technology: Created using Jekyll. Hosted on GitHub pages.
The result: You tell me!Seriously! Tell me.
View source code.

item.title: Python File Transfer System
item.description: The goal: Make a multi-platform Bash inspired file transfer system. Using native bash commands, the user should be able to add, get and create files/directories on the server from the client computer.
